name: Adopt-An-Alleyway (AAA)
description: Adopt An Alleyway's goal is to beautify Chinatown's alleyways and community. AAA is a youth-run youth-led youth leadership development program that aims to develop useful skills and provide a space to make new friends and memories for highs school aged youths. AAA provides community services events to SF Chinatown seniors, children, fellow youth, and other community residents. We aim to bridge the generational gaps by engaging in arts and crafts with children, socializing and laughing with senio
